name: ARPB_PNB_RULE_OVERRIDES
description: This table contains information on all the Posted Not Billed rules that have been overridden by users.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PNB_OVRIDE_RULE_ID
columns.description: This item stores Posted Not Billed rules that have been overidden.

columns.name: PNB_OVRIDE_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores Posted Not Billed rule overriding user.

columns.name: PNB_OVRIDE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PNB_OVRIDE_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores Posted Not Billed rule overriding instant in UTC.

columns.name: PNB_OVRIDE_COMMENT
columns.description: This item stores Posted Not Billed rule override comment.
